body: In order for a ranged siege engine to fire, it needs to be loaded with ammunition. Loading ammunition takes a number of full-round actions depending on the siege engine (this time can be reduced to move actions if the crew leader has the Master Siege Engineer feat).
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Siege Engines/Siege Engine Rules/Ranged Siege Engines/Load Ammunition
name: Load Ammunition
